      • containsGmlCoverageDescriptions

        public void containsGmlCoverageDescriptions()
        [Test] A conforming GMLJP2 encoded file shall use a GMLCOV coverage description in accord with OGC 12-108 so as to describe the coverage collection and to describe the individual coverages. In particular, the permitted coverage types include:
        • gmlcov:GridCoverage
        • gmlcov:RectifiedGridCoverage
        • gmlcov:ReferenceableGridCoverage
        • any coverage type derived thereof with exactly 2 dimensions

        Sources

        • OGC 08-085r4, A.1.1: GMLJP2 file contains a GMLCOV coverage
        • gmljp2-gmlcov

      • findXMLbox

        Box findXMLbox(List<Box> boxes)
        Finds an XML box in a JPEG 2000 codestream.
        Parameters:
        boxes - A collection of boxes extracted from the codestream.
        Returns:
        An XML Box, or null if one could not be found.
